seo_keywords: Hoover PowerDash not picking up water

problems.title: Brush Not Spinning / Burning Smell
problems.description: The brush roll stopped turning and there is a smell of burnt rubber.
possible_causes: Belt is broken or stretched (Very common)
Debris jammed in brush roll ends
solution_steps: Remove the nozzle cover and check the belt. If it's snapped or loose, replace it.
Clear hair from the brush roll bearings.

problems.title: Not Picking Up Water / Carpet stays wet
problems.description: Suction is weak and dirty water is not entering the tank.
possible_causes: Nozzle front is clogged with lint
solution_steps: Remove the front nozzle and rinse out carpet fibers/hair clogging the suction path.
Clean the red filter screen under the dirty water tank.
